#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

void prefix(string s, int n) {
	vector<int> p(s.length() + 1);
	p[0] = 0;
	for(int i = 1; i < s.length(); i++) {
		int j = p[i - 1];
		while(j > 0 && s[i] != s[j]) {
			j = p[j-1];
		}
		if(s[i] == s[j]) {
			p[i] = j + 1;
		} else {
			p[i] = 0;
		}
	}
	for(int i = 0; i < s.length(); i++) {
		if(p[i] == n) {
			cout<<"1\n";
			return;
		}
	}
	cout<<"0\n";
	return;
}

int main() {
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	string a,b;
	while(t--) {
		cin>>a>>b;
		int n = b.length();
		b += '#';
		b += a;
		prefix(b, n);
	}
	return 0;
}
